lessonTitleText: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind
lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: How long had the man been blind?
answers: Since the day he was born

questions.text: What did Jesus do as He healed the man?
answers: He put mud on his eyes and told him to wash
He touched his ears and told him to listen
He poked him in the eye
He told him to climb a mountain

questions.text: What did the crowd say about the man who had been blind?
answers: They werenâ€™t sure he was the same man
They said he had never been blind
They said he must have a twin brother

questions.text: Who talked with the man about what happened?
What rule did the Pharisees think Jesus broke?
Who did the Pharisees talk to after they questioned the man?
What did the Pharisees want the man to say?
Who did Jesus tell the man He was?
answers: The Son of Man, the Messiah

questions.text: What does it mean that Jesus is the Son of Man, the Messiah?
answers: He is the promised Savior sent to save us from sin
He is a soldier who wins battles
He is an angel from heaven

questions.text: When Jesus told the man who He was, what did the man do?
